name: @bdombro/hookedjs
description: Example application for running a fullstack, serverless Node API app on AWS

scripts.build: npm run web:build && npm run api:build
scripts.//web:build:hint: must mv lib out of public to avoid adding hashes to the filenames
scripts.web:build: mv public/lib . && NODE_ENV=production snowpack build && cp -r lib web-build && mv lib public && workbox generateSW && date > web-build/buildTime.txt
scripts.api:build: npm run lint && tsc && SAM_CLI_TELEMETRY=0 sam build && npm run api:clean
scripts.db:dev:init: docker run -d --name serverless-mysql -p 3306:3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=password -e MYSQL_DATABASE=public mysql:5.7
scripts.db:dev:seed: npm run typeorm -- schema:drop && ts-node --require ./src/lib/polyfills src/db/seed.node.ts
scripts.typeorm:migration-gen: npm run typeorm -- schema:drop && npm run typeorm -- migration:run && npm run typeorm -- migration:generate -n

imports.#hint: Subpath folder mappings are deprecated after node v16 -- Maybe consider npm/module-alias later
